# autoglue_cluster (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue Kubernetes cluster.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_provider` (String) Cloud provider identifier (for example, aws, gcp, azure).
- `name` (String) Cluster name.
- `region` (String) Region to deploy the cluster into.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique cluster ID.
- `status` (String) Current cluster status as reported by Autoglue.
